name: Evil Stickies
description:
Evil Stickies is a 2D stickman fighting game in which 2 players battle for life and death. The players get the chance challenge each other in exciting levels to find out who the best fighter is.

Features

  • 3 different levels
  • XBOX 360 Controller Support
  • Dynamic soundtrack
  • Substitution mechanic
  • Sudden Death mode
  • Match settings
